description: Phase used to handle a container’s material status, retest and expiration dates; may be marked as autocomplete for background execution without operator interaction.
intent: To allow the operator (or system in auto-complete mode) to update and confirm the container’s QC status and manage retest and expiration dates, including optional label printing, and record these changes in the electronic batch record.

inputs.Container ID: ID of the container whose QC status and dates will be managed (entered or selected at runtime)
inputs.Select at Run Time: Flag indicating container ID will be provided during execution
inputs.New QC Status: The material status value to assign (can be static or from variable)
inputs.From Variable: Flag to retrieve new status value from specified variable
inputs.Variable ID: ID of variable containing the new status value
inputs.Print Label: Flag indicating whether a new label should be printed
inputs.Label ID: ID of the label template to use if printing is enabled
inputs.Rule: Rule for calculating retest and expiration dates (e.g., authored values, phase markers, execution time)
inputs.Retest Date: Specified or calculated retest date (supports special variables)
inputs.Expiration Date: Specified or calculated expiration date (supports special variables)
inputs.Phase ID: Phase marker ID for offset calculations
inputs.Operation ID: Operation marker ID for offset calculations
inputs.Start Time: Start time marker for offset calculations
inputs.End Time: End time marker for offset calculations
inputs.Retest Offset Time: Offset interval for retest date (supports special variables)
inputs.Expiration Offset Time: Offset interval for expiration date (supports special variables)
inputs.UOM: Unit of measure for offset intervals
inputs.Number of Labels to Print: Number of labels to print, default is 1
inputs.Confirmation Type: Type of confirmation required upon phase completion

outputs.Updated EBR: Electronic Batch Record updated with new QC status, retest and expiration dates and execution details
outputs.Printed Label: Physical label(s) printed if Print Label is selected

preconditions: Container must exist and be accessible in the batch execution context
postconditions: EBR reflects updated material status and date values
side_effects: May trigger background execution if auto-complete is enabled
example_usage: Operator enters or scans the container ID, selects a new QC status or variable, configures date calculation rule, sets retest and expiration values, opts to print a label, and clicks Finish to update the batch record.
